name: Hexplosions
description:
To Play this game in a web browser: http://digitaliss.github.io/hexplosions.html

Hexplosions is a turn-based strategy puzzle game. Save 10 allies. Don't lose more than 3 allies!

Controls are UP/DOWN to move your selected row and SPACE to confirm selection.

Here are more detailed instructions: http://digitaliss.github.io/Hexplosions_Instructions.pdf
